FuncDef: The display dfs-group consistency-check command displays the configuration of M-LAG master and backup devices. The display dfs-group consistency-check command displays the configuration of M-LAG master and backup devices.
CLIs: display dfs-group consistency-check { global | interface { m-lag <m-lag-id> | peer-link <peer-linkid> } | static-arp | static-mac }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the configuration of M-LAG master and backup devices in the system.
-

Displays the configuration of M-LAG master and backup devices on the M-LAG member interface.
-

Specifies the M-LAG ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 2048.

Specifies the peer-link ID.
The value is 1.

Displays static ARP entry information on the M-LAG master and backup devices.
-

Displays static MAC address entry information on the M-LAG master and backup devices.
-

ExtraInfo: You can run the display dfs-group consistency-check command to check the configuration in the system and on the M-LAG member interface when M-LAG consistency check is enabled.
